Package com.vectorprint.configuration

classes that support flexible configuration of applications

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Configurable<P extends Map>
    A Configurable object should be initialized by a SettingsProvider.
    EnhancedMap
    This interface is a suggested way to store values for settings as arrays of String and retrieve settings in the type needed by applications.
    PropertyHelp
    A suggested way for providing help for properties.
    SettingsProvider<P extends Map>
    A settings provider is responsible for providing configuration information to a configuarble object.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    PropertyHelpImpl  
    Settings
    Enhances Java Map with support for data types, debugging info, working with default values in code.
